name: BRADDA
description:
Working with brands since 2009, we have built a methodology strong enough to realign large brands such as building brands for new companies, provided they have the same ideal: to believe that your brand can be your most valuable asset; and that this brand should be the strategic basis of the company. 
BRADDA is a team formed by Graphic Designers working on the four pillars: Responsibility, Ingenious, Intimacy, and Primor.
